messages.content: Write a paragraph within 100 words on "A VISIT TO A ZOO" with the following points:     [Points :  Introduction------who visited with you-----animals in  the zoo-----birds in the zoo-----water birds,snakes etc-----your feeling]

Last weekend, I had the opportunity to visit a zoo with my family. The excitement was palpable as we eagerly entered the gates. The zoo was home to a wide variety of animals, each more fascinating than the last. We marveled at the majestic lions, playful monkeys, and graceful giraffes. However, it was the birds that stole the show for me. The vibrant plumage of parrots and peacocks was a sight to behold. The water birds gliding effortlessly through ponds and lakes were a treat to watch. There were also intriguing snakes and reptiles, their scaly skin sending shivers down my spine. Overall, it was a delightful experience that left me in awe of the diversity and beauty of the animal kingdom.

Write a paragraph within 100 words on “A VISIT TO A ZOO” with the following points using easy words and sentence : [Points : Introduction------who visited with you-----animals in the zoo-----birds in the zoo-----water birds,snakes etc-----your feeling]

Last week, I went to the zoo with my family. It was a fun day out for all of us. The zoo had many interesting animals to see. There were lions, monkeys, and giraffes. But what caught my attention were the birds. They had bright and colorful feathers. Some were parrots and others were peacocks. I also saw water birds swimming in the ponds. It was amazing to watch them glide through the water. There were even snakes and reptiles. They looked scary, but I found them fascinating. I really enjoyed the visit to the zoo and it made me appreciate the beauty of nature and its creatures.
Write a letter to the headmaster of the institution asking for permission and help for a tree plantation programme to be organised   by  the Eco-club of your school  using easy word and sentence.

[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State, ZIP Code]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]

[Headmaster's Name]
[Institution Name]
[Institution Address]
[City, State, ZIP Code]

Subject: Permission and Help for Tree Plantation Programme

Dear [Headmaster's Name],

I hope this letter finds you in good health and high spirits. I am writing to seek your permission and support for a tree plantation programme that the Eco-club of our school wishes to organize. As you may be aware, our Eco-club aims to create awareness about the importance of environmental conservation among students and initiate activities that contribute to a greener and cleaner environment.

With your kind permission, we would like to conduct a tree plantation programme on the school premises. Our plan is to plant a variety of trees such as neem, mango, and coconut trees. By doing so, we intend to enhance the aesthetic appeal of the campus, provide shade to students during summers, and contribute to the fight against climate change.

In order to ensure the success of this programme, we request your support and guidance. We kindly seek your permission to allocate a suitable area for planting the trees and to provide us with the necessary tools and resources required for the plantation activity. Additionally, it would be highly appreciated if you could arrange for a guest speaker or an expert in the field to address the students about the significance of tree plantation and environmental conservation.

Furthermore, we request your assistance in coordinating with the school administration, staff members, and students for their active participation in this programme. We believe that together, we can create a positive impact on the environment and instill a sense of responsibility towards the planet among the students.

We assure you that this tree plantation programme will be conducted with utmost care and responsibility. We will ensure proper maintenance of the planted trees by regularly watering and monitoring their growth.

We sincerely hope that you will grant us the permission and extend your support for this noble cause. We are confident that with your guidance, the tree plantation programme will be a huge success. The Eco-club and the entire school will be grateful for your kind consideration.

Thank you for your time and anticipated cooperation. We look forward to your positive response.

Yours sincerely,

[Your Name]

Write a letter within 100 words to the headmaster of the institution asking for permission and help for a tree plantation programme to be organised by the Eco-club of your school using easy word and sentence.

Subject: Permission and Help for Tree Plantation Programme

Dear [Headmaster's Name],

I hope you are doing well. I am writing on behalf of the Eco-club of our school to request your permission and assistance for organizing a tree plantation programme. Our club aims to raise awareness about the environment among students and participate in activities that promote a greener world.

We kindly seek your approval to conduct the tree plantation programme within the school premises. Our plan is to plant various trees such as neem, mango, and coconut trees. This will not only beautify our campus but also contribute to fighting climate change.

With your support, we request access to a suitable area for planting these trees. Additionally, any help in providing necessary tools and resources would be greatly appreciated. It would be wonderful if you could arrange a guest speaker to educate the students about environmental conservation and the importance of tree plantation.

We look forward to your approval and assistance in coordinating the programme among the students and staff members. Together, we can make a positive impact on our environment.

Thank you for your consideration and support. We eagerly await your response.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

বিষয়: গাছবাড়ি প্রোগ্রামের জন্য অনুমতি ও সহায়তা অনুরোধ

প্রিয় [প্রধান শিক্ষকের নাম],

আশা করি আপনি ভাল আছেন। আমি লিখছি আমাদের স্কুলের বায়ু-পরিস্থিতি সংরক্ষণ কমিটির পক্ষ থেকে গাছবাড়ি প্রোগ্রামের জন্য অনুমতি এবং সহায়তা অনুরোধ করছি। আমাদের কমিটির লক্ষ্য শিক্ষার্থীদের পরিবেশ সংরক্ষণের উপর সচেতন তৈরি করা এবং বায়ুমন্দন সম্পর্কিত কাজে অংশ নেয়া।

অনুমতি পাবার জন্য আমরা অনুরোধ করি স্কুলের মধ্যে গাছবাড়ি প্রোগ্রামটি আয়োজন করতে। আমাদের পরিকল্পনা হলো আমরা নিম গাছ, আমের গাছ এবং নারিকেল গাছের মধ্যে বিভিন্ন গাছ বাড়ানো। এইগুলি আমাদের ছাদপাতায় আরও সুন্দর করবে এবং জলযান পরিদর্শক বা ক্লাস মেয়েদের জন্য ছত্র সরবরাহ করবে।

আপনার সহযোগিতা ও সাহায্যের জন্য আমাদের অনুরোধ করছি। যদি সম্ভব হয়, শিক্ষানিদেরকে পরিবেশ সংরক্ষণ এবং গাছবাড়ি এর গুরুত্ব সম্পর্কে বক্তা বা বিশেষজ্ঞ উপস্থাপন করার জন্য সেটা সম্ভব হলে আমাদেরকে সাহায্য করতে খুব উপযুক্ত হতো।

আরওভালবাসা আর উপকার পাওয়ার জন্য আপনার সাহায্যের অপেক্ষায় আছি। আমাদের উত্তরের জন্য অপেক্ষা করছি।

আপনার সত্যভাবে,

[আপনার নাম]

Write a newspaper report within 100 words with the help of the following points using easy words and sentences       [Points: Pilkhana, Jaldapara National Park, Feb-20,2017-----A man killed by a terrible elephant-----Mainak(the kunki elephant) gone with the mahut for grazing-----Mainak suddenly furious-----trampled the mahut who fell down from its back]

Man Killed by Wild Elephant in Jaldapara National Park

February 20, 2017

Jaldapara: In a tragic incident that occurred at Pilkhana in Jaldapara National Park, a man was killed by a wild elephant on Monday morning. The incident took place around 9 am when Mainak, the kunki elephant, was taken by its mahut for grazing. Suddenly, Mainak became agitated and went into a frenzy. It trampled the mahut, who fell off its back and suffered fatal injuries. The forest department officials arrived at the scene promptly to control the situation. The deceased mahut was identified as Mr. Rajesh Das, a dedicated and experienced caretaker of elephants. The incident has left the local community in shock and mourning. The forest officials have launched an investigation to determine the cause behind Mainak's sudden aggression.
what can i say all about Chandrayan 3 in bengali for my youtube chanel.

চান্দ্রযান 3 সম্পর্কে বাংলায় YouTube চ্যানেলের জন্য কি বলা যায় তা নিয়ে অবশ্যই আপনি জানেন। তবে চান্দ্রযান 3 হচ্ছে ভারতীয় অনুবাদয় 'চান্দ্রযান' অভিনয়নয় প্রকল্পের তৃতীয় রক্তাক্ত সংস্করণ। এটি ভারতীয় স্থলজ বিজ্ঞানী এবং উপগ্রহের বিশেষজ্ঞদের একটি স্বপ্ন, যার মাধ্যমে ভারতের নক্ষত্রবিদদের আরও গবেষণা ও কঠিন সমস্যার সমাধানে সক্ষম করতে আনা হচ্ছে। চান্দ্রযান 3 এর মাধ্যমে ভারত মহাসাগরের জীবনযাত্রাকে সংরক্ষণ করার জন্য মানব বসবাসকে প্রতিষ্ঠা দেওয়া যায়।  যা অন্যান্য নক্ষত্রগুলির সন্ধানে আরও সম্ভব করে দেয়।

how to be instragram creater and earn in easy tips
